website_summaries.verdict: This basic box fan offers a compact width and a low price.
pros: Can push air efficiently and quietly
A lightweight box fan that looks good and comes in several colors
Has a carry handle to make it easy to move
cons: Blades break easily if it falls

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Many reviews complained about it being loud but that was what I was looking for. I use it for sleeping and it drowns out noises nicely. It also moves the air well. The color isn't really purple, more of a maroon.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: It's super cool but super loud
customer_reviews.text: Color is over the top which is PERFECT for me. It moves plenty of air for my small space. The drawback is that this fan is LOUD and it's not a loud that you can tune out. It's high pitched torture chamber loud. I have blasted it with WD-40 and am letting it marinate for a day or two. Fingers crossed. One would think that a company boasting 100+ years of experience in the art of fan building would have figured out the mechanics necessary for silent operation ...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect FAN!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it's purple, I think that's very unique and so cute. And the best thing about it too, is its loud, I like that, because it smooth sounding and keeps the noise outside out. I LOVE IT! Great deal. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: felicia jones

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: It's quiet for how much air it moves. You can still hear it, but turning up the tv a few notches will drown it out. It's a wind tunnel! Works great for a window fan.
customer_reviews.author: Xolin_

customer_reviews.title: Great - color is Mauvie / Purple - on the redish side of purple
customer_reviews.text: Started out tones noisy -but I guess whatever it was worn down and by the 2nd week it was just a normal fan sound ...
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: Good Ole Box Fan
customer_reviews.text: I love the big box fans and it was time to get a new one. This one is light weight compared to my older fan but packs a punch. I'm happy with it and love that it is purple! It may be noisy to others but I like the background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Shezza

customer_reviews.title: Vibrates excessively. Isn't heavy enough to not move itself on full speed.
customer_reviews.text: Just too light, despite being advertised as the metal version. The entire thing shudders and buffets at all speeds, but on maximum will travel backwards and eventually fall over. Better off with the higher quality deluxe versions (when they are in stock). Perhaps they can be opened up and the blades balanced.. I might get to it one day.
customer_reviews.author: Breaddrink

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Pasco fans last forever. Kept mine outside for 3 years.. only reason had to order another because it was dropped and blade broke.
customer_reviews.author: Lorien Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Powerful window fan
customer_reviews.text: The color is nice! The fan is very powerful. The price is good. But it's a bit loud!
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Lasko Cool Colors 20" Box Fan Durable Metal Frame Purple
customer_reviews.text: Lasko Cool Colors 20" Box Fan Durable Metal Frame Purple work great but the price right on spot for quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Dbean

customer_reviews.title: Looked Used
customer_reviews.text: Think it had been sold before but I need a fan because of a remodel job that is being done. So keeping it. Thought it would have more power but it is cold now so stores do not have any or many to choose so I am stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love the purple fan. Works great. I have been using it everyday for the pass two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nette A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase but NOISY
customer_reviews.text: Works, looks like the picture but it’s so LOUD. Even on setting 1, it’s NOISY. It also doesn’t stand on its own so I have to lean it on something when I use it. It’s an okay purchase, but I’m sure there are better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: chrystina wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Good, but unstable
customer_reviews.text: This fan is good for the price. It’s quiet and does a good job, but it doesn’t stay up well on its own. It’s quite unstable and will rattle or fall unless propped up against something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived intact, functions
customer_reviews.text: Fan looks fine, works fine. Arrived quickly. My only question is why in the world it came from Walmart! In a walmart box, with a walmart tag on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nes

customer_reviews.title: and it certainly doesn't disappoint in this regard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for the outrageous color, and it certainly doesn't disappoint in this regard. But I've been pleasantly surprised at the actual air-blowing performance as well. Yes, it is just a cheap box fan at heart, but it seems to move more air with less noise than the other cheap box fans in our house. Maybe it's just the color getting to me. Either way, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Finch

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. Air flow is great! It is a loud fan though but I like it. If you do not like loud do not get it. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Veena

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with feet and would not stay standing so I returned this. Customer service was great
customer_reviews.author: LAURA D aka MAWMOM

customer_reviews.title: awesome quality blows super hard just noisy but what fan isnt
customer_reviews.text: Noisy but that’s every box fan!! I love this color so much I want to get a blue one for my living room. This thing really blows!!! GET IT!
customer_reviews.author: Miss.J0lii💕

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it a couple days but works great color as pictured happy with item UPDATE: A year and four months later of frequent use and its still working!
customer_reviews.author: Krystalyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fan for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan, not too big, works well, makes plenty of noise (what I bought it for).
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Bewley

customer_reviews.title: Let it blow!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new purple fan~ works great but makes too much noise even on low, but has a good amount of wind power, even on low.
customer_reviews.author: Buggs55

customer_reviews.title: That I love the product and it came so early.
customer_reviews.text: I love that received my product much sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R. Macon

customer_reviews.title: Great box fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a fan for their home
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Purple Everytime
customer_reviews.text: I love the color it arrived sooner then it was suppose to. That was great we were in the middle of a heat wave. It kept my room cool and on some mornings I had to turn it off because it was to cold. Even when I turned it off my room remained cool.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Purple Fan
customer_reviews.text: Made a grate Gift for my Cousin that love Purple
customer_reviews.author: Alice Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer time heat, great for dorm room!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it puts off a lot of cold air, kind of loud but that’s perfectly fine. Light weight and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Works well, very nice color.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I'm dinging it 1 Star because the trim parts are not color matched. (My wife whined about it.)
customer_reviews.author: Rational

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: The fan came the box was damaged.The fan was damaged when removed from box.The metal housing was badly damaged.The plastic fan shroud was damaged,cracked.My wife was heartbroken.I took it apart and kinda repaired it. I wanted to return it but she wanted it then.
customer_reviews.author: daniel t. millick

customer_reviews.title: Fan looks and works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Fan came in a large box, but looked as promised online. Was easy to set up and worked as promised. Love this fan!!
customer_reviews.author: Abhijit S.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: got here faster than expected, good size, vibrant colour, looks well made, generates a good amount of air in a small space, loud but not louder than you'd expect from a box fan ( could drown it out easily ) love it would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Savanah McClantoc

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, extremely noisy
customer_reviews.text: We bought for our bedroom, but were unable to sleep. After the first night, moved it to the dan.
customer_reviews.author: Etan

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Wish blade was metal but overall good value for the price. Cooled a 12x15 room just fine
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's not the same shade of purple as the picture shown, but it's still a good fan, and still purple, I guess. It works fine
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Waist
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t put out much air and didn’t come with pieces to screw in bottom so fan won’t even stand
customer_reviews.author: DeCarla Conner

customer_reviews.title: On time
customer_reviews.text: It looks good I like it she like it and it cools the room
customer_reviews.author: Larry peoples

customer_reviews.title: Still runs.
customer_reviews.text: Came in all bent and beat up. After bending everything back I was surprised it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: The color is Barney The Dinosaur purple, if anyone is wondering.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it was going to be the deep blue-violet-y purple that it appears to be in the picture. It's almost exactly the color of Barney the Purple Dinosaur. If that's what you're looking for, then this is your fan. Aside from the color, the fan is very loud and the base is not stable. Even with the inserts placed into the bottom to keep it upright, it still slides around on our hardwood floors when it's on the High or Medium settings. You can save $10 or so and buy a comparable white or black box fan from Walmart or Target.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Color in photo not accurate
customer_reviews.text: So I posted a question AND emailed the Seller regarding the color of this fan. I was told by the Seller it is a deep purple as shown in the photo. Well, it is not. If the color is important to you be advised it is a red-violet color and not the blue-violet color as shown in the photo. It is more of the color of the fuscia version. I’m disappointed in the color but am going to keep it as the fan seems to be working very well. I just wish the photo was more representative of the true color of the item. Took off one star for the color.
customer_reviews.author: Siameez

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT the purple Lasko fan
customer_reviews.text: This is simply a pink Lasko fan shipped direct from Walmart. It is not the purple Lasko fan. They buy it cheap from Walmart, charge you more, and keep the difference for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Lowest setting too fast and loud.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the fact that it doesn't shake or vibrate. That being said, the lowest speed is really fast (and somewhat noisy). Wish it could revolve more slowly at the lowest settings.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm GrangerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this fan because my bedroom is purple. ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan because my bedroom is purple. Well, the fan is more fuchsia. It's sitting in the box in the garage because I really didn't need it. I probably should return it
customer_reviews.author: Julie Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Rackety sounding fan due to top being bent during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Maked all kind of racket on all three settings. Only way to get rid of the annoying sound was to lay the top on a shoebox so that the air moved up towards the ceiling. My husband figured it out. The packaging for shipping had been inadequate. He managed to put the top upward and the sound stopped.
customer_reviews.author: SKH

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Box Fan.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived factory damaged. Unable to attach small plastic "feet" metal slot was cut but not moulded. Keeps falling over. Cannot leave unattended. Otherwise it's your basic box fan.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis the King

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: So we have box fans in all our bedrooms mostly for the noise but my daughter loves the beautiful purple of this fan!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: fan
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use in our garage during the summer months. Plastic so doubt it will withstand for many years. Otherwise it did what I intended it to do.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Could have saved money
customer_reviews.text: Lighter purple than what is pictured and fan is loud. Fan is perfect size, it arrived as scheduled. My complaint is I found it at Walmart for less money!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Roberts- Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not all metal but wow! Forceful.
customer_reviews.text: So loud and amazingly powerful. Like a tornado. You wouldn't think so but yep. Its says metal but the only thing thats metal is the frame. Blades and screen are platic. Bummin...
customer_reviews.author: Watts-riley

customer_reviews.title: Cool breeze
customer_reviews.text: My apt. Is warm and I like cool air to sleep. Love the color
customer_reviews.author: Susan Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the recipient was very happy. It's good in her window.
customer_reviews.author: LBCRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Wife is happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and fast delivery. Wife is a purple fiend and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Chris Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant color. This fan is very loud and, doesn't circulate much air. It serves the purpose I bought it for though... to add color to my room. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Julianna

customer_reviews.title: CLOUD MARKET IS A GREAT COMPANY AND THE FAN IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: CLOUD MARKET IS A GREAT COMPANY AND THE FAN IS GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: TERRY W.

product_meta.title: Lasko Cool Colors 20" Box Fan Durable Metal Frame Purple
product_meta.description: Lasko Cool Colors 20" 3-Speed Box Fan, Model #B20301, Purple
